unnormalised: SpiceJet's baggage policy is wild, last time they weighed my *laddoos* more seriously than my actual suitcase! Paid Rs. 2500 extra, felt like I was smuggling gold, not mithai.
normalised: SpiceJet's baggage policy is wild, last time they weighed my laddoos more seriously than my actual suitcase! Paid rupees two thousand five hundred extra, felt like I was smuggling gold, not mithai.
